Package edu.sru.bayne.DistanceAndDirections.controller

Class DistanceandDirectionsController

java.lang.Object
edu.sru.bayne.DistanceAndDirections.controller.DistanceandDirectionsController
@Controller public class DistanceandDirectionsController extends Object
The controller class for handling interaction between the following: 1. The "SearchRepository" (CRUD Repository) and corresponding "search" entities. 2. The html webpages found in ./src/main/resources/templates
Author:
Gregory Bayne

    • addAddressesForm

      @RequestMapping("/newsearch") public String addAddressesForm(Search search)
      Mapping for a "New Query" button in the home webpage to send for a new webpage, one containing an address form to input new data in an instance of Search.
      Parameters:
      search - is an instance of the Entity Search
      Returns:
      path to address form webpage (new-distance-query.html)

    • addQuery

      @RequestMapping("/add-query") public String addQuery(@Validated Search search, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model) throws IOException
      Mapping for adding query (new-distance-query.html). Data entered in address form from the webpage is saved to an instance in the database. Additionally, a hash table is checked to see if the distance has been calculated. If it is not, the DistanceAPI.java calculates and saved the Distance associated with the query. The "/add-query" page redirects to the "/newsearch" page.
      Parameters:
      search - is an instance of the Entity Search
      result -
      model - is the 'Search' entity used by the repository
      Returns:
      path to home (disMatrixIndex.html)
      Throws:
      IOException

    • pullDirections

      @RequestMapping("/find-directions/{id}") public String pullDirections(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Gets mapping for directions (directions.html)page. Mapping is dependent on id of the Search Instance. This entity is used to display directions of the instance with the same id.
      Parameters:
      id - is the ID of the instance of the Search entity
      model - is the 'Search' entity used by the repository
      Returns:
      path to Home

    • deleteUser

      @GetMapping("/delete/{id}") public String deleteUser(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Mapping for a call in which a Search instance with a provided id is deleted. The "/delete/{id}" page instantly redirects to the "/newsearch" page.
      Parameters:
      id - is the ID of the instance of the Search entity
      model - is the 'Search' entity used by the repository
      Returns:
